ygData.subject: Re: dodge.. turned into a Fletching question
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I am a Dark Elf and forgot about it (oops) and I am now lvl 11.  I have been running into damage problems from creatures hitting me so hard.  I have a
ygData.messageBody:
Well I am a Dark Elf and forgot about it (oops) and I am now lvl 11. I have
been running into damage problems from creatures hitting me so hard. I have
a complete set of leather and was thinking I needed better armor to get to a
higher level because they creatures keep hitting me so hard. Maybe not now.
Anyway now I have started Blacksmithing (up to 6 ya!) maybe I can postpone
it for now until I get some more pp (cost is just below 1.5pp per skill
point so far without selling the bits). And still haven't gotten any
movement/improvement out of my Archery skill. And now looking for Fletching
supplies in Netrick to build my own Arrows/Bows.

Does any one know where the book for Fletching is and/or the supplies are
(found some behind the mushroom inn) or do I have to go to another city,
hopefully evil because I am KOS anymore at Freeport, and of course the
vendors wouldn't talk to me anyway? Any ideas or do I have to make (don't
want to do this) a mule character to get the items (still can't believe they
didn't make the tools available to us at the bow shop). I have searched and
haven't found it, I will look again tonight, maybe I missed someone.

Tenin - Tarew Marr
